title: How to Compliment a Guy's Appearance

steps.title: A simple compliment can make any guy’s day.
steps.content: A simple compliment can make any guy’s day. Just letting a guy know that you like what you see is the right move for building up some fantastic chemistry. Try out one of these handy and simple compliments: [2] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 29 June 2021. “You’re handsome .” “I think you’re beautiful.” “Hey, gorgeous guy!”

steps.title: Your guy will love knowing that he makes an impression.
steps.content: Your guy will love knowing that he makes an impression. You don’t necessarily need to get into the specifics of what makes a guy attractive to you—just let him know that his looks have caught your attention. These casual compliments can start a really nice conversation: [3] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 5 November 2019. “You sort of shine.” “I’ll be honest: your looks really caught my eye.” “You’re good-looking enough to stand out in any crowd.” See how other wikiHow readers like to compliment the men in their lives in wikiHow's "What are the best compliments you can give to a guy?" forum .

steps.title: Complimenting your guy’s smile will make him incredibly happy.
steps.content: Complimenting your guy’s smile will make him incredibly happy. If a guy’s smiling, it usually means that he’s feeling pretty good, which makes for the perfect opportunity to let them know that he looks good too. Try saying something like: [4] X Research source “You look so sexy when you laugh.” “Seriously, you’ve got the smile of a movie star!” “You just have to smile for me to melt.”

steps.title: Let your guy know his hard work is paying off.
steps.content: Let your guy know his hard work is paying off. He’ll absolutely love you admiring his physique. Point out how sexy his arms look in the t-shirt he’s wearing, compliment his abs the next time he takes off his shirt, or tell him how perfectly his jeans have been fitting lately. Try one of these compliments: “I see you’ve been going to the gym, handsome.” “Your arms look great.” “Looks like that work you’ve been putting in the gym has been paying off.”

steps.title: Some guys are proud of their hair, so let him know he should be.
steps.content: Some guys are proud of their hair, so let him know he should be. A beautiful guy with beautiful hair deserves to know that he’s appreciated. Best of all, a compliment about a [5] X Research source guy’s hair is a pretty casual way of letting them know that you like how he looks. Any one of these compliments is a great option: “Your haircut looks great on you!” “I really like how you’ve been growing out your hair.” “Your new haircut has you looking like such a snack.”

steps.title: Get a little quirky with your compliments.
steps.content: Get a little quirky with your compliments. Giving a guy a hyper-specific compliment can make him laugh and feel flattered at the same time—and that’s definitely a winning combo. You might try saying something like: “I know it’s a little weird, but you have great-looking feet.” “You have a great jawline.” “You could cut something with those cheekbones!”

steps.title: How someone moves is a key part of their attractiveness.
steps.content: How someone moves is a key part of their attractiveness. Most people aren’t aware of how they look when they’re moving, so letting a guy know that he looks good doing it gives your flirting more originality and punch. Say something like: “You’ve got a sexy swagger.” “You move with so much class.” “I can tell you’re a great dancer just by watching you!”

steps.title: Your guy will love hearing that his clothes caught your eye.
steps.content: Your guy will love hearing that his clothes caught your eye. Clothes are part of our identity, and telling a guy that you like the way he dresses goes beyond just a simple comment about his appearance—it can also show him that you appreciate the person that he is. Say something like: [6] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 29 June 2021. “That shirt looks great on you!” “Your glasses make you look like Clark Kent.” “I gotta say that I wish I dressed half as well as you.”

steps.title: Everyone knows the eyes are windows to the soul.
steps.content: Everyone knows the eyes are windows to the soul. Giving a guy a compliment about his eyes can make him feel seen and appreciated in a way that other compliments just don’t accomplish. This kind of compliment can foster a deeper connection between you two. Say something like: [7] X Expert Source John Keegan Dating Coach Expert Interview. 29 June 2021. “You have intelligent eyes.” “I could look at your eyes for hours.” “Your eyes sparkle.”

steps.title: Pick-up lines may be cheesy, but they’re also funny and cute.
steps.content: Pick-up lines may be cheesy, but they’re also funny and cute. Using a pick-up line can show the cutie you’ve got your eye on that not only are you into him and his looks, but you’ve also got a personality of your own. If your guy has a good sense of humor, he’ll love one of these classic pick-up lines: [8] X Research source “Are you an artist? You’re so good at drawing me in.” “If you were a taser, you’d be set to ‘stun.’” “I believe that honesty is the best policy, so to be completely honest, you’re the sexiest man I’ve ever seen.”

steps.title: Sometimes it’s okay to just lay it all out on the line.
steps.content: Sometimes it’s okay to just lay it all out on the line. If you’ve developed a closer relationship with a guy, letting him know that you think he’s beautiful from head to toe can show him how much you care. Put yourself out there! Try something like: “I could look at you all day.” “Everything about you is gorgeous.” “Just seeing you is a total treat.”
